_instructions: This file controls ALL audio for the game.
To change a sound: replace the 'src' value with a URL or local path.
Local example: './sounds/jump.wav'   (file must be in same folder as the HTML)
Music 'loop': true = loops forever, false = plays once.
DO NOT rename the top-level keys (music / sfx) — the game reads them by name.
You MAY add new sfx keys; call them with playSound('yourKey') in the JS.

bg._note: Background loop — plays while the game is running

jump._note: Played every time the player jumps or double-jumps

land._note: Played when the player lands back on the ground

coin._note: Played when the player collects a glowing crystal coin

hit._note: Played on death — when the player hits an enemy or obstacle
